bplab.dht11.dht11value: get dht11 temperature and humidity Value
bplab.dht11.dht11value|param|valueType: Select temperature(℃/℉) value or humidity percentage
bplab.lcd.initialize: Initialize LCD and set I2C address. PCF8574/PCF8574A address is 39/63
bplab.lcd.padBlank: Display the input number on the specified number of screens
bplab.lcd.showNumber: Display number at specified position on LCD
bplab.lcd.showString: Display string at specified position on LCD
bplab.servo360.spinOneWay: Spins the motor in one direction at full speed
bplab.servo360.spinOneWayWithSpeed: Spins the motor in one direction, with a speed from 0 to 100
bplab.servo360.spinOneWayWithSpeed|param: Which pin the motor is on
bplab.servo360.spinOneWay|param|pin: Which pin the motor is on
bplab.servo360.spinOtherWay: Spins the motor in other direction at full speed
bplab.servo360.spinOtherWayWithSpeed: Spins the motor in the other direction, with a speed from 0 to 100
bplab.servo360.spinOtherWayWithSpeed|par: Which pin the motor is on
bplab.servo360.spinOtherWay|param|pin: Which pin the motor is on
bplab.servo360.turnOffMotor: Turns off the motor at this pin
bplab.servo360.turnOffMotor|param|pin: Which pin the motor is on
bplab.sevenSegment.TM1637LEDs._dat: set data to 7-Segment, with given bit
bplab.sevenSegment.TM1637LEDs.intensity: set 7-Segment intensity, range is [0-8], 0 is off.
bplab.sevenSegment.TM1637LEDs.showBit: show a number in given position.
bplab.sevenSegment.TM1637LEDs.showBit|pa: the position of the LED, eg: 0
bplab.sevenSegment.create|param|clk: the CLK pin for 7-Segment, eg: DigitalPin.P12
bplab.sevenSegment.create|param|count: the count of the LED, eg: 4
bplab.sevenSegment.create|param|dio: the DIO pin for 7-Segment, eg: DigitalPin.P13
bplab.sevenSegment.create|param|intensit: the brightness of the LED, eg: 7
bplab.ultrasonic.ping: Send a ping and get the echo time (in microseconds) as a result
